wordGroup: solution provider 方案供应商；解决方案提供者

sentences.en: The state is still the main provider of welfare.
sentences.cn: 政府仍然是福利的主要提供者。

sentences.en: Usually, the service provider will reuse a canceled number after three to six months.
sentences.cn: 通常，服务提供者将在三到六个月后重新启用已取消的号码。

sentences.en: If you're not sure, it is always a good idea to check with your primary care provider.
sentences.cn: 如果您不确定，最好与您的初级保健提供者联系。
